data.name: ReRa
data.description: Supervised Relevance-Redundancy assessments for feature selection in omics-based classification

evidence: "In the notebooks provided, we show the steps performed to preprocess datasets, generate alternative feature spaces, tune and evaluate performances of several classification models."
"We propose ReRa, a new efficient Relevance-Redundancy approach including filtering and similarity evaluations based on the supervised information provided by the target classes."
"In the notebooks provided, we show the steps performed..." (implying users obtain and run notebooks/code directly from the repository).
